item.description: Manning continued "It never happened. Never. I really can't believe somebody would put something like this on the air."

item.title: Explosive Documentary Links Peyton Manning To Doping Ring
item.description:
Explosive Documentary Links Peyton Manning To Doping Ring

An Indianapolis anti-aging clinic supplied quarterback Peyton Manning with human growth hormone, a performance-enhancing drug banned by the NFL, a pharmacist who once worked at the clinic asserts in a new special report from Al Jazeera's Investigative Unit .

item.title: Winter Park Ski Train Unlikely To Return This Season, Says Resort
item.description:
Winter Park Ski Train Unlikely To Return This Season, Says Resort

Skiers hoping to take a resurrected Ski Train from Denver to Winter Park Resort will likely have to wait until next year. The resort says negotiations with Amtrak, Union Pacific and the Federal Railroad Administration are still underway. But ski season is in full swing and time is running out.

item.title: A Peyton Manning high and a football field wide mess avalanche blocks Monarch Pass.
item.description:
A Peyton Manning high and a football field wide mess avalanche blocks Monarch Pass.

Hwy 50 on Monarch Pass, but it looks like a 100 yard , 7' deep mess. #ColoradoAvalanches aren't just a hockey team.

item.title: Breck Brewery bought out by In-Bev's Anheuser-Busch
item.description:
Breck Brewery bought out by In-Bev's Anheuser-Busch

The beer wars in Colorado are just getting started.

item.title: Anheuser-Busch To Buy Breckenridge Brewery
item.description:
Anheuser-Busch To Buy Breckenridge Brewery

Anheuser-Busch announced Tuesday it will acquire Breckenridge Brewery, one of Colorado's most well-known craft beer makers. The deal is the latest in a string of acquisitions for industry giant Anheuser-Busch. It already owns six formerly independent breweries like Chicago's Goose Island and Tempe, Arizon'a Four Peaks.
